column2:
"\"Black Wolf\"... When you spoke those words, they touched my heart.
I can no longer doubt that you and I were acquainted."

"But this alone is not enough.
As scary as the thought is, I need to know more if I'm to regain my memory of who I am."

"I wish there was some other way...
Please, tell me everything you know about me..."

"W-what? I'm famous, so you're going to ask other people what they think?
That's a little... No, I asked, after all."
